author: serge
msg: PASS command would not handle passwords with a space in it.  parseCommand now remembers complete/original command line sent and PASS uses substring of that rather than argument object.

author: serge
msg: Fixed "."  problem, and buffer problems in SMTP Handler.  Put in freshly written CharTerminatedInputStream which does not include the terminated stream.  Highly robust and documented, but probably could use some optimization.  Also, SMTPHandler was having buffer problems when lots of data was passed at once because CharTerminatedInputStream was wrapping socketIn, rather than the BufferedReader.  Converted to DataInputStream (admitedly deprecated), and wraps this instead.

author: serge
msg: Created DNSServer component under JAMES (on same level as smtp server, user manager, etc...).  MailetContext now defines public Collection findMXRecords(String host), which JamesMailetContext implements.  RemoteDelivery mailet uses this and handles delivery to the hosts returned in the Collection from the MX record query.
